PackageOracle.name: DA_POSTAL_CODE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_POSTAL_CODE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.08.323531000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,postal_cd IN VARCHAR2
,county_id IN NUMBER
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,postal_cd IN VARCHAR2
,county_id IN NUMBER
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,postal_code_id IN NUMBER
,postal_cd IN VARCHAR2
,county_id IN NUMBER
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,postal_code_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_postal_code;

body.name: DA_POSTAL_CODE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_POSTAL_CODE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.08.334193000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,postal_cd IN VARCHAR2
,county_id IN NUMBER
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_postal_code.add(fx), parms=' || postal_cd || '|' || county_id || '|' || time_zone_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_postal_code a
(
a.postal_code_id
,a.postal_cd
,a.county_id
,a.time_zone_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_postal_code_id.NEXTVAL
,add.postal_cd
,add.county_id
,add.time_zone_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.postal_code_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_postal_code.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,postal_cd IN VARCHAR2
,county_id IN NUMBER
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_postal_code.add, parms=' || postal_cd || '|' || county_id || '|' || time_zone_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_postal_code a
(
a.postal_code_id
,a.postal_cd
,a.county_id
,a.time_zone_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_postal_code_id.NEXTVAL
,add.postal_cd
,add.county_id
,add.time_zone_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_postal_code.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,postal_code_id IN NUMBER
,postal_cd IN VARCHAR2
,county_id IN NUMBER
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_postal_code.add, parms=' || postal_code_id || '|' || postal_cd || '|' || county_id || '|' || time_zone_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_postal_code a
(
a.postal_code_id
,a.postal_cd
,a.county_id
,a.time_zone_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.postal_code_id
,add.postal_cd
,add.county_id
,add.time_zone_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_postal_code.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,postal_code_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_postal_code.del, parms=' || postal_code_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_postal_code a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.postal_code_id = del.postal_code_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_postal_code.del');

END del;

END da_postal_code;
